name: Fliplet
slogan: Prefab: The smart way to create custom apps
description:
No-code ease meets open-source power! Prefab apps combine no-code app editors with the extensibility of open source components. Enable anyone to create apps without running up against feature limitations.

Fliplet makes it easy for anyone to create, launch and maintain their own enterprise apps without needing to be a developer. This not only changes who can create apps but also the type of apps that are created. The cost of creating and maintaining apps previously made app creation prohibitive for the vast majority of businesses - the apps simply didn’t get built. Now apps can be built and published to a mobile device within 15 minutes. Updates can be published instantly. The infrastructure, security, data management is all handled for you by Fliplet.

Apps created with Fliplet are used to support key business processes such as communications, business information reporting, training, sales and marketing.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description:
Fliplet is a prefab app builder. It combines the benefits of no-code tools with the feature customisation of open-source software. We're on a mission to enable anyone to create beautiful and powerful apps. We believe there's huge untapped potential that can be realised by allowing a wider set of people to create apps.

This role is an amazing opportunity to join a growing business, that has already built a dazzling reputation in the industry.

There is fantastic scope for career development and great financial rewards - you just need to demonstrate commitment, a fantastic work ethic and a willingness to go above and beyond.


RESPONSIBILITIES: 
As an Account Executive, you will run the sales process for New Business.  
The ideal candidate for this position will be: 
- Prospecting and pitch Fliplet via email, phone, conferences and events,
- Working closely with the Account Manager to upsell existing customers and get referrals,
- Keep internal systems and CRM up to date and proactively managed. 
Working with the Marketing team to optimise lead generation and marketing materials
-Actively participate in Marketing Events and Trade Shows. You will need to travel internationally to attend such events, multiples times a year.

We would like to talk to you if you are:
- Have 2-3 years experience selling for a SaaS company, where you consistently met or exceeded quota
- Experience in B2B software sales
- Efficient CRM database management (Pipedrive)
- Solid rapport building skills and demonstrable negotiation skills
- Organise and prioritise your workload efficiently and independently


BENEFITS & PERKS 
At Fliplet, our team is our best asset. We are surrounded by smart and talented people who value hard work, who always want to improve. 

On the flip side, we offer an annual training budget of £500 and ensure that our team gets the latest tech, qualitative Friday drinks and some great team buildings! 

Salary range: £35 - 50K + Uncapped Commission / Bonus plan (OTE £90K)


HIRING PROCESS
We want to talk to you if you can bring some to the table and recognise yourself in our values: 
- Have empathy
- Always improving
- No bullshit 
- Maximise success 

Once we’ve received your application, and established what a great candidate you are, our interview process is: 
- A quick phone call with HR 
- A remote written test, followed by a debrief interview with HR and a member of your future team
- On-site interview with the HR and a member of your future team 
- Offer & reference checks
- Welcome aboard! 

You should apply if what we’re doing here at Fliplet excites you! 
To do so, please send a short cover letter to Emilie, HR Manager at edeneuville@fliplet.com explaining: 
1. How you’re planning to help Fliplet’s growth when you will be part of the team, 
2. and what makes you want to be part of the Fliplet team.

We look forward to hearing from you!

jobs.title: Experienced Software Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking to build a long term relationship with an experienced (3+ years) Software Developer to help us enhance Fliplet. 

Fliplet is a prefab app builder. It combines the benefits of no-code tools with the feature customisation of open-source software. We help companies rapidly build and launch mobile and web apps without coding or developer skills! Fliplet’s customers use the platform to deliver a suite of business tools. 

Working closely with Fliplet's Customer Success team, your main role will be to help customers customise Fliplet by developing web and mobile apps such as directory apps, event apps, survey apps, training apps, and ensure we deliver an amazing experience to our customers. 

You will primarily be using HTML, CSS and JS but you will be required to interface with Fliplet’s JS APIs for database communication. 

Based in Central London, we're open for remote colleagues.  

**Requirements:**
* 3+ years of applicable experience, 
* Experience with jQuery,
* Fluent in English (communication is key for this position),
* Experience building and delivering desktop and mobile applications,
* A relevant Master’s or Bachelor's degree,
* Enjoy building appealing user interfaces that customers love and crave, 
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team is essential,
* Empathy for our customers and the problems they face,
* Giving and receiving feedback while working with a team.

**Responsibilities:**
* Co-own and develop projects with your teammates and peers,
* Deal with customer requests,
* Investigating and fixing bugs,
* Assist in the building of our app templates,
* Create new features for these app templates.

**Technologies we use:**
* jQuery
* JS & REST APIs
* JavaScript 
* Promises
* SQL 
* Cordova
  
**You should apply if you:**
* Are matching with the requirements, 
* Are willing to use our technologies,
* Are hungry to learn and flexible,
* Have experience and enjoy working within a fast-paced company (start-up),
* Enjoy working in an environment where colleagues thrive on being independent,
* Want a high exposure to large amounts of technology and innovation,

**Our hiring process**
We want to talk to you if you can bring new skills to the table and recognise yourself in our values:
1. Have empathy 
2. Always be improving 
3. No bullshit 
4. Maximise success

Once we’ve received your application and established what a great candidate you are, our interview process is: 
1. A quick phone call with HR 
2. A remote written test to demonstrate your skills
3. Followed by a brief interview with HR and the hiring manager
4. A final task, more open-ended and less structured than the first one. It will give you an insight into our platform and an idea of the kind of tasks you will be doing as a developer.
5. A face-to-face meeting at the office to discuss your approach, cultural fit and to show you our working environment.
6. Offer & reference checks
7. Welcome aboard! 

All applications with the correct requirements will be reviewed and an answer will be sent.

jobs.title: Experienced Virtual Content Copywriter
jobs.description:
Fliplet is a prefab app builder. It combines the benefits of no-code tools with the feature customisation of open-source software. 

We’re currently looking for a remote freelancer to support our Customer Success team to manage and produce tutorial articles for our support website. 

**You will also be in charge of:** 
* Maintaining, reviewing and uploading content into WordPress and Kayako
* Research other products and how they produce tutorials, outline a recommended structure/template for tutorial articles
* Understand how to use Fliplet, our tool to be able to write articles on it
* Implement a process to manage the article creation, review and publish process 

**You should reach out if: **
* You have multiple experiences writing blogs or articles, 
* You’re a well organised and self-driven person,
* You can use a variety of software and pick up new software quickly, 
* You know how to manage yourself and are accountable for your work,
* English needs to be your first language. 

**Hiring Process**
If you’re interested in this position and have the highlighted skills, please send us 3 examples of your writing, ideally articles that explain “how to” do something. 

*Answer the screening questions online:* 
* Could you please send us 3 examples of your writing, ideally articles that explain how to do something
* What online software have you used in the past or currently using?
* How would you manage yourself weekly to ensure agreed delivery dates are respected?
* How would you prefer to manage us to ensure we have provided feedback on time to achieve expectations within agreed delivery dates?

*A first remote assessment to highlight your writing and planning skills*
* Using Fliplet, draft a document about how to add a form to an app
* Create a project plan for the delivery of the 18 tutorial articles (we will provide the list of articles). Include what steps you and Fliplet would need to take for each article

A 30 minutes call with HR and the hiring manager to review your assessment and answer any of your questions. If everything goes as expected, you've got the job! 

All applications with the correct requirement will be reviewed and an answer will be sent.
